data.title: Is bitcoin really digital gold? In 2025, the leading crypto has failed to answer that question
data.description: Bitcoin's big drop from a record price has led to questions about crypto's correlation to the broader market, and what it really represents in a portfolio.
data.author: Krysta Escobar
data.keywords: Bitcoin,Cryptocurrency,CBOE Volatility Index,Bitcoin/USD Coin Metrics,Investment strategy,Markets,Wall Street,Stock markets,Exchange-traded funds,business news
